title: Glitch made me dodge
body:
Hello,

I recently queued up for a game and when the Accept or Decline thing came up, I pressed accept and it brought me to the champ select screen, however the accept/decline was still showing so I could not select a champ and I dodged. Now I have to wait 5 minutes for a glitch that happened because of the client, not my fault. I don't mind waiting 5 minutes, however I do not like that I'm being punished for something I did not do wrong. Can someone please take this timer away from me?

Thanks
tsnakejake

Edit: Now I'm getting a black screen when I go to the loading screen. What is going onnn

replies.body: Those black screens when your pc is trying to load the game can sometimes be a sign that your network is having problems reaching our servers. It might be fixed by updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but if that doesn't help let's be sure to use this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to check for any packet loss.
